summary: A retextured Executioner hood that can be worn under a helmet
descriptionHtml:
Messing around with texturing and came up with these

Since I yet to find an ideal Chainmail hood that I can wear under a helmet, I decided to have an attempt at making my own.

It can be found on two Imperial dudes outside whiterun, they are pretty week so easily dispatched.
They are classed as Bandits so no trouble from the law.


I tried making a normal map but its quite complicated for me.
author: Beth
